issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I have seen this behavior for quite some time and I see various bugs already logged related to this, but I can't find anything definitive.

The specific example I have here today is I have set the run configuration to run the iphone simulator and set logging level to info. I am getting trace level logging in the console.

Additionally, I have set the log level to Error for the console via the dropdown and that also is ignored.
fields.summary: Studio: Log level set in run configuration not used

comments.body:
Hello Chaim,

Would you mind posting the other tickets that you found were related to this? I am unable to reproduce with:

Titanium Studio, build: 3.1.0.201303032333

Have you tried/are able to get the run configurations to work as expected on any other build? Or is it just this version of TI studio?

Regards,
Carter
